title: Validate basic headline stack functionality
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the mlb homepage
custom_steps: WHEN I look for the headline stack on the page
custom_expected: THEN I should see the header to be "Latest News"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I view the headline stack module
custom_steps_separated.expected: I should see at least 1 news article

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click on the first link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should be redirected to appropriate url targeted by the href

title: Verify the top story title, description match between forge-api, graphQL and UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on the mlb homepage
AND I have access to the DAPI endpoint for the top story
AND I have access to the graphQL queries for top story
custom_steps:
WHEN I see the top story on a web page
AND I make a request to DAPI to retrieve top story details: "https://beta-dapi.cms.mlbinfra.com/v2/content/en-us/sel-<remaing-slug-from-forge>"
AND I make a request to graphQL to retrieve the story details
custom_expected:
THEN I should be able to verify the following
the title value should match between all 3
the summary/description must match
the content type must match
